question: Which among the following is not among the three aspect of the interaction between caste system and politics, according to Rajini Kothari?
explanation:
Rajni Kothari points out three aspects of the interaction between caste system and politics in his book, “Caste in Indian Politics”.
The three aspects include:
1. Secular Dimension
2. Integration Dimension
3. Dimension of Consciousness – caste enters politics through “consciousness”.
